When to access an non-exist file, 404 and Errorpage is returned,  but the filter
configured for the error page didn't get invoked:

ERROR filter is configured:
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>ServletMappedTest_Filter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>/generic/*</url-pattern>
    <dispatcher>REQUEST</dispatcher>
    <dispatcher>INCLUDE</dispatcher>
    <dispatcher>FORWARD</dispatcher>
    <dispatcher>ERROR</dispatcher>
  </filter-mapping>

Errorpage is configured:
<error-page>
    <error-code>404</error-code>
    <location>/generic/ErrorPage</location>
  </error-page>
